divs: Sighting DetailsI have many years of tapes with different things on them started off with a few lights zipping around the sky then more of these lights started to appear more often making shapes in the sky also have a tape with a voice on it sounds like someone narrating my tape didn't hear it while taping and talking to my father while I was taping but when played back you hear a mans voice say (they brought medals not of this world they drew diagrams and maps of what they saw) also my cousin and I saw a big red looking fire ball real big had to be at least 25' high and same around circle come through my yard stopped by my house I ran in to get the camera and it was gone when I came out the same night is when we taped movement in the sky and the voice on tape Please I would like to share the tapes with some one who can help me understand what is going on why me AM I sapost to share this with the world or keep this stuff to my self I still see the orbs in the sky for some reason they follow me haven't been able to tape them anymore I believe they had something to do with braking my camera also I have a tape that looks like a cresent moon when you look closer you can see windows on this craft on it's side look like somethings are looking out and moving around in this craft please would love to show the right people these films not READY FOR THE WHOLE WORLD TO HEAR ME FREAKING OUT ON TAPE but would love for the right people to view all of these amazing sites I have on tape would like to know is there a connection between them and me would love to learn more
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Object Shape: Boomerang, Bullet, Missile, Cone, Chevron, Circle, Cylinder, Diamond, Disc, Egg, Fireball, Flash, Oval, Saturn-like, Sphere, Square, Rectagular, Star-like, Teardrop, Triangle, Other, Unknown
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Doylestown
There were no other sightings in Doylestown on or around January 2nd 2002
Summary: many years on tape of different sighting
